title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.3 - Participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 373.3 - Participation

State Regulations
(a) All retired
members and beneficiaries of the system whose retirement or survivor benefits
from the system for a plan year have been limited by code section 415 are
participants in this plan. (b) Participation in the plan is determined for each plan year. Participation in
the plan will cease for any plan year in which the retirement benefit of a
member of the system is not limited by code section 415. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
373.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
